text:
SnapEDA | San Francisco | Data & Algorithms Engineer (ONSITE)

SnapEDA (http://www.snapeda.com) is building the canonical library for circuit board design -- think "GitHub for Electronics" -- but more centralized design repository, and less version control. Tens of thousands of engineers use SnapEDA to design hardware faster, whether they're making robots, medical devices, or drones. SnapEDA is funded by Y Combinator and angels in the hardware industry.

Weâ€™re looking for: A software engineer who loves creatively solving problems that involve massive amounts of data. As a Data & Algorithms Engineer, your focus will be on building and expanding our automated data creation and verification systems, implementing new import and export functionality, and other creative data-related initiatives.

Please email info@snapeda.com if you're interested!

To learn more: - Job description: https://www.snapeda.com/jobs - Website: https://www.snapeda.com - Intro to SnapEDA (Video): https://vimeo.com/135199450
